hero.subtitle: MedExplain converts complex lab report jargon into simple, easy-to-read explanations — translated into your native language.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to understand your report
howItWorks.step1Desc: Drop your lab report (PDF, JPG, or PNG). We extract the data securely — nothing is stored.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our engine identifies test values, checks them against normal ranges, and writes a clear explanation.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get your results translated into your preferred language — powered by lingo.dev.

languages.title: Supported Languages
languages.subtitle: We speak your language — so your health report can too

trust.privacyDesc: Your reports are processed in memory and never stored. We delete everything after analysis.
trust.noDiagDesc: We explain, never diagnose. MedExplain always encourages consulting your doctor.
trust.aiDesc: Smart parsing + localization powered by lingo.dev for context-aware translations.

report.resultsExplain: Here's what they mean in plain language.

disclaimer.bannerText: MedExplain provides simplified explanations for educational purposes only. It does not diagnose conditions or recommend treatments. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional for medical advice.
disclaimer.inline: For educational purposes only — not a substitute for medical advice.

footer.disclaimerText: MedExplain is an educational tool only. It does not provide medical diagnoses, treatment advice, or professional medical opinions. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for medical concerns. The explanations provided are simplified and may not capture the full clinical context.
